snippet.title: Plastris Launch Trailer: Puzzle Game for PC (Steam)
snippet.description:
Plastris on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227860/Plastris
Trailer was made by: http://www.youtube.com/c/ArtMissKiss
Game music by: https://twitter.com/hyp3rsleep

Plastris is a casual indie puzzle game for PC (Steam). The goal of Plastris is to fill in all cells on the screen. Two differently shaped tools will come to your aid: the first one is used to fill in the cells it overlaps and the second - removes everything from the ground it touches.

The puzzles in Plastris are suitable for people of all ages, ranging from kids to the elderly. Come and challenge your mind while listening to pleasant music in this extremely relaxing new puzzle game!

My Games ► https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/15522/Khud0Bedn0/
Discord ► https://discord.gg/NMe8DcU (Friendly Server for Game Developers)
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Khud0Games (Random Thoughts and Updates)
